item.title: Respect for gender goes both ways. A rant from a modern male.
item.description: I'll probably upset a lot of people because this is something that people just don't talk about, and would be seen as weak if said out loud. But here it is: I'm sick of the male stereotype. You know how "woman, get in the kitchen!" is a totally not ok thing to say? For so many reasons, not just because it's demeaning, and it attempts to put someone in their place, but also as a person.
